subject: Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Ski Jumping
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Thomas Morgenstern of Austria turned in the best overall performance Sunday to win the first stop of the prestigious Four Hills ski jumping tournament in Oberstdorf, Germany.
snippet: Thomas Morgenstern of Austria turned in the best overall performance Sunday to win the first stop of the prestigious Four Hills ski jumping tournament in Oberstdorf, Germany.
